lines.text: Hey boss, I tawt I taw a putty-tat.
You did, you did tee a putty-tat.

We are gathered here today to pay homage to this magnificent cat... who fought his natural instincts to save this little bird. Yes - and now, gentlemen, you may take your pictures of the cat kissing the little bird.
Come on, cat. Kiss the little birdie.

[encouragingly]
Come on, puddy tat. Kiss the wittle birdie!
[Sylvester eats Tweety, the mayor slaps him on the head to push Tweety out, and he falls to the ground]
Ooh, he's a bad puddy tat!
